name: Caramel Frosting VI
author: BETHMCSHANE
summary: This is an excellent caramel glaze frosting sprinkled with toasted pecans.  Makes enough frosting for a 9x13 cake.
directions: In a shallow 6-inch saucepan, thoroughly mix brown sugar and flour
Stir in butter and milk, and cook over medium-high heat until mixture comes to a rolling boil
Beat with a wooden spoon until mixture begins to thicken
Mix in vanilla and continue beating until frosting is the consistency of thick honey, no more than 1 to 2 minutes
Immediately pour caramel frosting onto cooled cake and quickly spread with the back of a warm spoon before frosting begins to set up
Quickly sprinkle top of cake with toasted pecans
Frosting will set up completely in a few hours
